verbs.description: [ARG0: Vermont Gov. Phil Scott ( R )] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: signed] [ARG1: a law permitting the import of prescription drugs from Canada into the state] . Proponents of the law , which has been opposed by President Trump 's health officials as well as pharmaceutical companies , believe it will help fight rising drug prices . It was widely supported in Vermont 's Democratic - controlled state legislature . The law must still be certified by the Department of Health ...
